template: SELECT * FROM airport WHERE icao_code = '{airports_icao_code}';
description: Retrieve airport details using a specific ICAO code.

template: SELECT id, name, icao_code FROM airport WHERE elevation_ft BETWEEN {airports_elevation_ft} AND {airports_elevation_ft}
description: Find airports with a specific elevation range.

template: SELECT icao_code, iata_code, local_code FROM airport WHERE name LIKE "{airports_name}"
description: Search for airports by matching part of the airport name.

template: SELECT * FROM airport WHERE gps_code = "{airports_gps_code}" OR local_code = "{airports_local_code}"
description: Retrieve airport details by GPS or local airport code.

template: SELECT r.name AS region_name, COUNT(a.id) AS airport_count FROM airport a JOIN regions r ON a.iso_region = r.code WHERE a.iso_country = "{countries_code}" GROUP BY r.name ORDER BY r.name ASC;
description: Count the number of airports per region within a country.

template: SELECT id, ident, name FROM airport WHERE iso_country = "{airports_iso_country}"
description: List all airports located in a specific country.

template: SELECT af.type, af.description, af.frequency_mhz FROM airport_frequencies af WHERE af.airport_ident = "{airports_ident}";
description: Get radio frequencies associated with a specific airport.

template: SELECT * FROM airport WHERE continent = "{airports_continent}" AND iso_region LIKE "{airports_iso_region}"
description: Search airports by continent and region.

template: SELECT a.name, a.municipality, a.iso_country FROM airport a WHERE a.type IN ('large_airport', 'medium_airport') AND a.iso_country = "{airports_iso_country}"
description: Find specific airport information by its ICAO code.

template: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.municipality, a.iso_country FROM airport a WHERE a.id IN (SELECT id FROM airport WHERE keywords LIKE "{airports_keywords}") OR name LIKE "{airports_keywords}"
description: Search airports using a keyword that matches name or Wikipedia tag.

template: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.type, a.iso_country, a.municipality FROM airport a WHERE a.elevation_ft > (SELECT AVG(elevation_ft) FROM airport WHERE iso_country = "{airports_iso_country}") OR a.elevation_ft > {airports_elevation_ft}
description: Find airports with elevation above the country average or a fixed value.

template: SELECT id, length_ft, width_ft,surface, lighted, le_ident, he_ident FROM runways where airport_ref = (SELECT id FROM airport WHERE name = "{airports_name}");
description: Get runways for an airport specified by name.

template: SELECT 'Airport Frequency' as source_type, af.airport_ident as code, a.name as location_name, af.type as frequency_type, af.frequency_mhz as frequency, af.description, a.municipality, a.iso_country FROM airport_frequencies af JOIN airport a ON af.airport_ident = a.ident WHERE af.frequency_mhz BETWEEN {airport-frequencies_frequency_mhz} AND  {airport-frequencies_frequency_mhz}  UNION ALL SELECT 'Navaid Frequency' as source_type,    n.ident as code, n.name as location_name, n.type as frequency_type,n.frequency_khz / 1000.0 as frequency,  n.usageType as description, 'N/A' as municipality, n.iso_country FROM navaids n WHERE n.frequency_khz IS NOT NULL AND (n.frequency_khz / 1000.0) BETWEEN  {airport-frequencies_frequency_mhz}  AND  {airport-frequencies_frequency_mhz}  ORDER BY frequency;
description: Search all frequencies (naval one and airport ones) within specified frequency ranges.

template: SELECT a.id, a.ident, a.name, a.latitude_deg, a.longitude_deg,(6371 * ACOS(COS(RADIANS(a.latitude_deg)) * COS(RADIANS(b.latitude_deg)) * COS(RADIANS(b.longitude_deg) - RADIANS(a.longitude_deg)) + SIN(RADIANS(a.latitude_deg)) * SIN(RADIANS(b.latitude_deg)))) AS distance FROM airport a JOIN airport b ON b.name = "{airports_name}" WHERE a.id != b.id  ORDER BY distance LIMIT 50;
description: Search the nearest 50 airports given an airport name.

template: SELECT a.ident, a.name, r.name AS region_name FROM airport a JOIN regions r ON a.iso_region = r.code WHERE r.name = "{regions_name}";
description: Find all airport in a specific region using a JOIN.

template: SELECT r.name AS region_name, COUNT(a.id) AS airport_count FROM airport a JOIN regions r ON a.iso_region = r.code WHERE a.iso_country = "{countries_code}" GROUP BY r.name ORDER BY r.name ASC;
description: Find all regions of a country given the country name and their number of airports, ordered by region name.

template: SELECT name, 'airport' AS type FROM airport WHERE keywords LIKE CONCAT("%",  "{airports_keywords}", "%") UNION SELECT name, 'region' FROM regions WHERE keywords LIKE CONCAT("%", "{airports_keywords}", "%") UNION SELECT name, 'country' FROM countries WHERE keywords LIKE CONCAT("%", "{airports_keywords}", "%");
description: Get all entities matching a keyword, using UNIONs.

template: SELECT name, 'airport' AS entity_type FROM airport WHERE keywords LIKE CONCAT("%", "{airports_keywords}", "%") UNION SELECT name, 'region' AS entity_type FROM regions WHERE keywords LIKE CONCAT("%", "{regions_keywords}", "%")  UNION SELECT name, 'country' AS entity_type FROM countries WHERE keywords LIKE CONCAT("%", "{countries_keywords}", "%");
description: "Get all entities matching different keywords  using UNIONs"

template: SELECT a.name AS airport_name, a.ident AS airport_code, a.municipality, COUNT(r.id) AS runway_count FROM airport a JOIN runways r ON a.id = r.airport_ref WHERE a.iso_country = "{countries_code}" GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.ident, a.municipality HAVING COUNT(r.id) > {rand_small_pos_number} ORDER BY runway_count DESC, a.name ASC;
description: "Finds all airports in a specified country that have more than X runways"

template: SELECT n.type, c.name as country_name, COUNT(n.id) as navaid_count  FROM navaids n JOIN countries c ON n.iso_country = c.code WHERE c.code = "{countries_code}" OR c.name LIKE CONCAT("%", "{countries_name}", "%") GROUP BY n.type, c.name HAVING COUNT(n.id) > {rand_small_pos_number} ORDER BY navaid_count DESC;
description: Count types of navaids per country.

template: SELECT name, IFNULL(iata_code, 'NO_IATA') AS iata_display, IFNULL(icao_code, 'NO_ICAO') AS icao_display,  MID(name, 1, 5) AS short_name, municipality FROM airport WHERE municipality LIKE "{airports_municipality};"
description: Get airport name, IATA, and ICAO code using the municipality name.

template: SELECT a.name AS airport_name,a.municipality,COUNT(r.id) AS runway_count, CAST(AVG(r.length_ft) AS SIGNED) AS avg_runway_length FROM airport a JOIN runways r ON a.id = r.airport_ref WHERE r.length_ft >=  CAST("{rand_medium_pos_number}" AS SIGNED) AND a.iso_country = "{countries_code}" GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.municipality ORDER BY avg_runway_length DESC;
description: List airports in a country with runways longer than a given length

template: SELECT id FROM airports WHERE {conditions}
description: Retrieve airport IDs based on a flexible set of search conditions.
